sentences.english: Some 28 percent of adolescents say they are too tired to exercise, due to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 28%的年轻人表示，由于睡眠不足而没劲儿运动。

sentences.english: I am ill from want of sleep.
Another area of interest to the study of decision-making revolves around sleep deprivation.
sentences.chinese: 另一个研究揭示了决策力跟睡眠不足有关。

sentences.english: What symptom can Morpheus inadequacy cause?
sentences.chinese: 睡眠不足会引起什么症状？

sentences.english: Can Morpheus inadequacy appear what kind of symptom?
sentences.chinese: 睡眠不足会出现什么样的症状呢？

sentences.english: Her eyes were puffed from lack of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她因睡眠不足而双眼浮肿。

sentences.english: Periorbital dark circles are often caused by sleep deprivation.
sentences.chinese: 黑眼圈通常是由睡眠不足引起的。

sentences.english: People sometimes drag through life because of a chronic sleep deficit.
sentences.chinese: 人们有时因长期睡眠不足而疲疲塌塌地度过一生。

sentences.english: Still, the sleep loss did not boost the amount of food the men consumed during the day.
sentences.chinese: 不过睡眠不足并未影响他们在白天时对于食物的消耗。

sentences.english: To study the Effects of sleep insufficiency on function of the nervus system in college students.
sentences.chinese: 研究睡眠不足对大学生中枢神经系统功能造成的影响。

sentences.english: Even in my sleep-deprived state I've managed to pull off one of my classic pranks.
sentences.chinese: 即使处于睡眠不足状态，我的恶作剧还是屡试不爽。

sentences.english: Exhaustion transfers, morpheus is not worth the dizziness that cause, how should do?
sentences.chinese: 疲劳过渡，睡眠不足引起的头晕，应该怎么办？

sentences.english: I lost the two finals and also missed that black which has since given me a few sleepless nights.
sentences.chinese: 我输掉了两场决赛，同时也因睡眠不足而错失了黑球。

sentences.english: I certainly don’t feel sleep deprived… quite the contrary.
sentences.chinese: 我没觉得睡眠不足，相反感觉很棒。

sentences.english: Insufficient sleep was associated with 10 of the 11 health-risk behaviors examined.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠不足与11项健康危险行为中的10项有关。

sentences.english: Without enough sleep, it may be hard to be active or to make good food choices.
sentences.chinese: 如果睡眠不足，孩子们很难活跃也很难有个好胃口。

definition: to stay up late or all night
sleep/to sleep/(computing) to enter sleep mode
